snippet: The Algonquin Hotel is shutting down its 35-year-old supper club and cabaret.
abstract: The Algonquin Hotel is shutting down its 35-year-old supper club and cabaret.
lead_paragraph: It's better known for its voices than its viands, but the Oak Room has been an essential dinnertime destination for most of its 32 years in the Algonquin Hotel. As of May, however, when the hotel reopens after a re-do, the room's cabaret singing will be silenced.

headline.main: Song Is Over at the Algonquin's Oak Room
